name: The Looper's BUG
description:
Hello, Human!

My name is Looper and I used to be able to become a Ghost once I die (I inevitably die after some time), but I got too ambitious wanting to live forever and now, after some attempt to become truly immortal, I just... well... die (and explode). ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

But I manage to left some vital orbs behind while I walk, so my Looper clones could live a little longer and hopefully go to the next level. You are in control... of all us, like a hero! Or just a programmer, or a gamer, I don't know. So can you help us to reach the portals?
